{{Wireless embedded system |brand=CLEAR |model=WIXFBR-117 |revision= |upc=094922011176 |ean= |asin=B0068B3642 |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=09/27/2010 |manuf_country=China |manuf=Gemtek |manuf_model=WIXFBR-117 |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=WiMAX modem,access point |fcc_id=MXFWIXFBR-117 |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Beceem |cpu1_model=BCSB5200-3 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1= |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=USB (non-standard connector) |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=Gemtek WIXFBR-117USB |wi1_module_if=USB (non-standard connector) |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT3070 |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu= |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags=WiMAX |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=WiFiRSU_XX |default_ssid_regex=^WiFiRSU_[0-9a-f]{2}$ |default_ip=192.168.15.1 |default_user= |default_pass=CLEAR123 |oui=AC:81:12 |oui_eth= |default_ch= }} BCSB5200-3 + BCSR200 WiMAX chipset (BCS5250)
According to [http://www.nintendo.com/consumer/wfc/en_na/routers/Gemtek/WIXFBR-117.jsp Nintendo's Router Database], the device assumes the SSID of 'WiFiRSU_XX' where 'XX' is the last two digits of the ( MAC address.
It is also said that the default WiFi password is the last eight digits of the MAC address.
